item.title: Mpox in China: New mutated strain of mpox virus, clade 1b detected - The Times of India
item.description:
New Mutated Strain of Mpox Virus Detected in China

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

The new strain of the mutated monkeypox virus, clade 1b, has been identified in China, raising concerns about a cluster outbreak linked to recent infections.

  • A cluster of the monkeypox virus subclade Ib was discovered, originating from a foreigner with a history in the Democratic Republic of the Congo.
  • Authorities in provinces like Zhejiang, Guangdong, Beijing, and Tianjin have initiated a joint prevention mechanism.
  • Four related cases were identified among close contacts, all experiencing mild symptoms.
  • Common symptoms include rash, herpes, fever, chills, and swollen lymph nodes.
  • Chinese authorities are urging citizens traveling from monkeypox-affected areas to report their health status.
‚ÄúThe epidemic has been effectively handled,‚Äù said the China CDC.

The detection of this new mpox strain highlights the need for vigilance and rapid response by health authorities to contain potential outbreaks.

item.title: Farmer, who attempted suicide at Shambhu border, dies at Patiala hospital - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Farmer Dies After Suicide Attempt at Shambhu Border

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

A 55-year-old farmer protesting at the Shambhu border between Punjab and Haryana allegedly died by suicide, marking the second such incident at the protest site within three weeks. The farmer, from Pahuwind in Tarn Taran district, took this extreme step due to frustrations regarding unresolved issues despite ongoing protests for a minimum support price (MSP).

  • The farmer attempted suicide at the Shambhu border.
  • He was later taken to Rajindra Hospital in Patiala where he died.
  • Another farmer had died by suicide just weeks prior due to distress over a leader‚Äôs health.
  • Farmer leaders warned of potential unrest if health issues persist among leaders.
‚ÄúGod forbid if anything untoward happens to Dallewal ji, then perhaps the situation may not remain under control of the Central government,‚Äù - Farmer leader Abhimanyu Kohar

This incident highlights ongoing tensions at the protest sites and the urgent need for dialogue between farmers and the government.

item.title: Fire Meets Zero Gravity As NASA Preps for Major Spacewalks - SciTechDaily
item.description:
Fire Meets Zero Gravity As NASA Preps for Major Spacewalks

Publication Date: Not specified Source: NASA

The article discusses recent activities aboard the International Space Station (ISS) as NASA prepares for upcoming spacewalks and conducts important research on fire behavior in microgravity and exercise effects on astronauts.

  • The crew on the ISS is focused on microgravity research related to fire safety and exercise science.
  • A spacewalk is planned to repair and enhance scientific hardware on the ISS.
  • NASA Flight Engineers Don Pettit and Nick Hague are involved in both experiments and preparations for the spacewalks.
  • Pettit is working with combustion experiments to improve fire safety protocols for future missions.
  • Training for the astronauts includes using advanced exercise equipment to monitor physical health in space.
  • Two spacewalks are scheduled for January 16 and January 23 to address specific maintenance and upgrades on the ISS.
  • International collaboration takes place among NASA and Roscosmos engineers to prepare for future missions.
NASA managers will hold a preview briefing of the upcoming spacewalks on NASA+.

This preparation showcases not only the ongoing work within the ISS but also the dedication of NASA and international partners to advancing space exploration even amidst challenges.

item.title: Qualcomm wants to see Samsung at the Galaxy Unpacked event, here‚Äôs why - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Qualcomm Seeks Samsung's Presence at Galaxy Unpacked 2025

January 09, 2025 / Moneycontrol

Samsung is set to unveil its next-generation Galaxy devices at the upcoming Galaxy Unpacked event. Qualcomm's Snapdragon chips are expected to power these new devices.

  • Samsung confirmed the Galaxy Unpacked event for 2025.
  • The Galaxy S25 series is anticipated to be launched at the event.
  • Qualcomm hinted at its involvement through a post on social media.
  • The Galaxy S25 may feature either Snapdragon or Exynos processors in different markets.
  • Further details will be revealed at the event on January 22.
‚ÄúSee you there.‚Äù - Snapdragon Twitter Account

The collaboration between Samsung and Qualcomm indicates a strong partnership for upcoming technology innovations in their devices.

item.title: California wildfire: Burning Los Angeles looks ‚Äòapocalyptic‚Äô in scary visuals - Hindustan Times
item.description:
California Wildfires Turn Los Angeles Into 'Apocalyptic' Scene

Date: Jan 09, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

The city of Los Angeles is facing devastating wildfires that have turned the sky orange and burned through famous neighborhoods, prompting evacuations and showcasing scenes likened to an apocalypse.

  • Wildfires fueled by 'Santa Ana' winds reached areas including Hollywood Hills and inflicted damage upon celebrity homes.
  • Social media is flooded with visuals depicting fireballs and thick smoke, resembling scenes from a nightmare.
  • Approximately 100 elderly residents were evacuated from a senior care facility in Altadena as flames encroached on their location.
  • The wildfires have resulted in five fatalities and numerous destroyed homes.
  • Strong winds, comparable to hurricane force, have complicated firefighting efforts, with aerial support only resuming recently.

üö® LOS ANGELES IS BURNING
Our hearts ache for everyone in Pacific Palisades and Los Angeles as these insane devastating fires rage on.

The ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles highlight the severe impact of climate-driven disasters, as communities rally to support those affected while firefighting efforts continue.

item.title: OnePlus 13, 13R support Jio 5.5G network: What does that mean for the user - India Today
item.description:
OnePlus 13, 13R support Jio 5.5G network: What does that mean for the user

Published On: Jan 9, 2025 | Source: Divya Bhati

OnePlus has launched its new OnePlus 13 series in India with support for the 5.5G network, marking a significant upgrade in mobile connectivity for users.

  • The OnePlus 13 and 13R are the first smartphones in India to support the 5.5G network.
  • The 5.5G technology, developed with Jio, allows devices to connect to multiple network cells, enhancing speed and reducing latency.
  • A live demo showcased the OnePlus 13 achieving download speeds of over 1,000 Mbps on the 5.5G network.
  • The new network provides benefits for streaming, gaming, and clearer voice calls in challenging environments.
‚ÄúThe OnePlus 13 series are the first devices to feature 5.5G in India, thanks to our partnership with Jio,‚Äù says James Paterson, OnePlus senior global PR manager.

This launch emphasizes OnePlus's commitment to enhancing user experience through advanced technology, tailored specifically for Indian conditions.

item.title: An extra 10 gram of THIS nutrient can help in weight loss: Expert - The Times of India
item.description:
An extra 10 gram of THIS nutrient can help in weight loss: Expert

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: The Mirror UK

Weight loss is challenging, and dietary fiber plays a crucial role in this journey. Experts emphasize that increasing fiber intake is essential for weight management and overall health.

  • Fiber is a type of carbohydrate found in plant-based foods that the body cannot digest.
  • There are two types of fiber: soluble and insoluble, each offering different health benefits.
  • Dr. Binita Kalaria highlights that most adults have a daily fiber deficit of about 10 grams.
  • To meet the recommended 30 grams of daily fiber, individuals can swap refined grains for whole grains and include fiber-rich foods in their diet.
‚ÄúMost people have a significant daily ‚Äòfibre gap‚Äô of around 10 grams a day,‚Äù says Dr. Binita Kalaria.

With a few changes in dietary habits, anyone can increase their fiber intake and improve their chances of successful weight loss.

item.title: ‚ÄòWind up alliance‚Äô: Omar Abdullah on Tejashwi Yadav's ‚ÄòINDIA bloc limited to 2024 polls‚Äô remark - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Omar Abdullah Reacts to Tejashwi Yadav's Remarks on INDIA Bloc's Future

Date: Jan 09, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Jammu and Kashmir Chief Minister Omar Abdullah responded to RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav's comments regarding the INDIA bloc's limitations concerning the upcoming Lok Sabha elections.

  • Tejashwi Yadav indicated that the INDIA bloc's purpose is primarily to defeat the BJP in the 2024 elections.
  • Omar Abdullah stated that there has been no formal leadership or agenda established for the bloc, questioning its future beyond the elections.
  • He emphasized that the alliance shouldn't just exist for the elections, hinting at the need for clarity and active participation from member parties.
‚ÄúAs far as I remember, there was no time limit to the INDIA alliance.‚Äù - Omar Abdullah

Abdullah urged the Congress party to justify its leadership within the INDIA bloc, highlighting that their collaboration should extend beyond just the upcoming elections.

item.title: JAXA deploys first ever wooden satellite in space from ISS - WION
item.description:
JAXA Deploys First Ever Wooden Satellite in Space from ISS

Publication Date: January 9, 2025 Source: Wion

LignoSat, the world‚Äôs first wooden satellite, launched into orbit last month to explore the potential of wood in space applications.

  • LignoSat was delivered to the International Space Station aboard a SpaceX Dragon cargo capsule in November 2024.
  • The satellite is made from honoki magnolia wood and uses a traditional Japanese wood-joining technique.
  • Over its six-month mission, it will assess wood's performance versus traditional materials like aluminum and titanium.
  • LignoSat will monitor the effects of extreme temperatures and radiation in space.
  • The project aims to inform future designs for habitats on the Moon or Mars using sustainable materials.
  • It also aims to reduce space debris impact by ensuring complete combustion upon re-entry.
‚ÄúWith timber, a material we can produce ourselves, we could build habitats and work in space indefinitely,‚Äù said Takao Doi, an astronaut and researcher.

This innovative project marks a significant step towards utilizing sustainable materials in space exploration.

item.title: Sensex falls nearly 500 pts, Nifty below 23,550: Pessimism over Fed rate cut, Q3 jitters among key factors... - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Sensex falls over 500 pts, Nifty below 23,550: Pessimism over Fed rate cut, Q3 jitters among key factors behind market decline today

Date: January 09, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

The equity markets in India traded lower as the benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty declined, following cautious investor sentiment and global cues ahead of the December quarter earnings season.

  • The BSE Sensex fell 513.72 points or 0.65% at 77,634.77.
  • The NSE Nifty slipped 164.75 points or 0.69% at 23,524.20.
  • Key laggards included Tata Motors, Larsen & Toubro, and Zomato.
  • Investors are cautious ahead of Tata Consultancy Services' Q3 results announcement.
‚ÄúWith the Q3 results season starting today, markets will react to corporate performance. The results of TCS will provide insight into the IT sector‚Äôs outlook.‚Äù - Dr. V K Vijayakumar, Chief Investment Strategist at Geojit Financial Services.

The equity markets continue to react to global economic factors, with investors remaining alert as the earnings season progresses.

item.title: 100,000 flee, 1,500 buildings destroyed as Los Angeles wildfires race unchecked - Hindustan Times
item.description:
100,000 flee, 1,500 buildings destroyed as Los Angeles wildfires race unchecked

Date: Jan 09, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Wildfires have wreaked havoc in the Los Angeles region, forcing over 100,000 residents to evacuate and causing significant destruction, including the loss of many celebrity homes.

  • At least five people have perished in the wildfires affecting Los Angeles.
  • Approximately 1,500 buildings, including homes in affluent areas, have been destroyed.
  • Evacuations have affected numerous celebrities such as Paris Hilton and Mandy Moore.
  • A new fire erupted in the Hollywood Hills, prompting more evacuations.
  • Firefighting efforts are being assisted by thousands of firefighters from other states.
  • Hurricane-force Santa Ana winds are exacerbating the situation.
  • Water shortages are complicating firefighting efforts in some regions.
  • President Biden has declared a federal disaster, providing aid for those impacted.
  • Many residents remain unsure about the status of their homes amidst ongoing fires.
  • Experts attribute the wildfires to climate change and extreme weather conditions.
‚ÄúMeteorologists highlight the role of climate change in worsening the wildfires.‚Äù

The ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles represent a significant threat to life and property, with ongoing evacuations and dire circumstances affecting thousands.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 35: The Allu Arjun starrer is Rs 230 crore away from beati - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' worldwide box office collection day 35

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

After 35 days in theaters, Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2' has amassed an impressive worldwide box office collection of Rs 1,840 crores, which places it just Rs 230 crore short of dethroning Aamir Khan's 'Dangal'.

  • The film has made Rs 2.15 crore on day 35, bringing its total domestic collection to Rs 1213 crore.
  • 'Pushpa 2' has surpassed the box office collection of 'Baahubali 2', making it one of the highest-grossing films.
  • An extended version of the film will be released on January 17, but the release is delayed due to technical reasons.
  • Competition from Ram Charan's 'Game Changer' releasing on January 14 may affect 'Pushpa 2's screening availability.
'Pushpa 2' may face reduced screens, impacting its chances to surpass 'Dangal' as a new competitor arrives.

The race against time for 'Pushpa 2' continues as it endeavors to break through the remaining barriers for box office supremacy.

item.title: 'Without a shadow of a doubt': Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli defended by ex-cricketer for Champions Trophy - The Times of India
item.description:
Without a shadow of a doubt: Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli defended by ex-cricketer for Champions Trophy place

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Times of India

The article discusses the endorsement of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli's positions in the Champions Trophy by a former cricketer, emphasizing their importance to the team.

  • The ex-cricketer believes both players deserve their spots despite recent criticisms.
  • Sharma and Kohli are seen as key figures for India's chances in the tournament.
  • The article highlights their past performances and experience.
‚ÄúBoth of them are invaluable to the team's structure and strategy,‚Äù said the former cricketer.

This support reflects a broader confidence in experienced players during crucial tournaments.

item.title: 'Fire emergency at NASA's lab': Jet Propulsion Laboratory closed due to raging wildfire - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Fire Emergency at NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory Due to LA Wildfire

Date: January 09, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

A raging wildfire has disrupted operations at NASA‚Äôs Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL), located at the foothills of the San Gabriel Mountains near Los Angeles. The Eaton Fire has brought the centre to a halt, forcing closure and evacuations while threatening critical robotic space missions.

  • The Eaton Fire ignited on January 7, scorching over 1,000 acres and is being fueled by strong winds.
  • JPL is temporarily closed, with all non-emergency personnel evacuated.
  • Director Laurie Leshin confirmed no fire damage yet, but evacuations are ongoing in the area.
  • Robotic missions such as Perseverance rover and Europa Clipper are currently at risk.
‚ÄúJPL is closed except for emergency personnel,‚Äù - Laurie Leshin

The ongoing wildfire poses a significant threat to operations at JPL, emphasizing the vulnerability of significant scientific infrastructure to natural disasters.

item.title: India-Taliban talks: Region in flux and 5 reasons behind Delhi‚Äôs decision to engage Kabul - The Indian Express
item.description:
India-Taliban talks: Region in flux and 5 reasons behind Delhi‚Äôs decision to engage Kabul

Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

The recent meeting between Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri and Taliban-ruled Afghanistan‚Äôs acting Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi comes amidst changing geopolitical landscapes.

  • India is pursuing its national and security interests amidst regional instability.
  • No official recognition of the Taliban government is planned yet.
  • Efforts are being made to adapt to the evolving situation in Afghanistan.
‚ÄúThis is an effort by India to secure its own national and security interests with many moving parts in play.‚Äù

The dialogue signifies India's strategic engagement as it navigates the complexities of its relationship with Afghanistan.

item.title: Elon Musk looking to oust UK PM Keir Starmer? Report suggests efforts at destabilisation - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Elon Musk looking to oust UK PM Keir Starmer? Report suggests efforts at destabilisation

Published: 09 January 2025, Source: The Financial Times

Tech billionaire Elon Musk is reportedly collaborating with his allies to find ways to depose Keir Starmer as the UK Prime Minister in the lead-up to the next general elections.

  • Musk is exploring support for alternative political movements, particularly Reform UK, led by Nigel Farage.
  • The billionaire has voiced that the Reform UK party "needs a new leader" and is considering candidates.
  • Rupert Lowe, a Reform UK MP, has emerged as a potential candidate for leadership replacement.
  • Musk has accused PM Starmer of being complicit in significant issues facing the UK.
  • His involvement in UK politics includes calling for a national investigation into grooming cases affecting girls.
‚ÄúThe Reform UK party needs a new leader,‚Äù Musk has stated, indicating a significant shift in political dynamics.

This involvement of Musk in UK politics signifies a potentially transformative period ahead, highlighting the influence he seeks to exert on British political leadership.

item.title: ‚ÄòHow long can you stare at your wife?‚Äô: L&T chairman says he wants employees to work on Sunday too - Hindustan Times
item.description:
'How long can you stare at your wife?': L&T chairman says he wants employees to work on Sunday too

Date: Jan 09, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The chairman of Larsen & Toubro, SN Subrahmanyan, has caused controversy by suggesting employees should work 90 hours a week, expressing a desire for them to work on Sundays as well.

  • Subrahmanyan stated he regrets employees are not required to work Sundays, saying it would make him happy.
  • He questioned what employees do at home, asking, "How long can you stare at your wife?"
  • He compared work hours in China and the USA, claiming Chinese workers put in 90 hours a week.
  • His comments were criticized on Reddit, with comparisons made to Infosys founder Narayana Murthy's similar statements.
‚ÄúI regret I am not able to make you work on Sundays. If I can make you work on Sundays, I will be more happy, because I work on Sundays.‚Äù

The chairman's remarks have sparked a conversation about work-life balance in the corporate world and the expectations placed on employees.

item.title: 'Intensely Fake': NASA astronaut's recent aurora video from space sparks authenticity debate online - Moneycontrol
item.description:
'Intensely Fake': NASA Astronaut's Recent Aurora Video Sparks Authenticity Debate Online

Date: January 09, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

NASA astronaut Don Pettit has shared a mesmerizing video showcasing vibrant green auroras seen from the International Space Station (ISS). The clip, shared on January 6 via X, left viewers in awe and sparked debates about its authenticity.

  • The nine-second video highlights the green glow of auroras created by charged particles from the Sun interacting with Earth‚Äôs magnetic field.
  • Pettit captioned the post, ‚ÄúFlying over aurora; intensely green.‚Äù
  • Social media reacted with a mix of admiration and skepticism regarding the authenticity of the video.
‚ÄúFlying over aurora; intensely green.‚Äù - Don Pettit (@astro_Pettit)

Comments ranged from awe to disbelief, with one viewer exclaiming, ‚ÄúOh my goodness, wow!‚Äù while another questioned its effect on equipment.

‚ÄúOh my goodness wow‚Äù - Jack Beyer (@thejackbeyer)

The video continues to captivate and divide audiences online.

item.title: Pushpa 2: The Rule box office collection Day 35: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna starrer maintaines stea - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2: The Rule Box Office Collection Day 35: Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna Starrer Maintains Steady Graph; Set to Hit Rs 25 Crore Mark on 5th Week

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

The film continues its impressive box office performance, with predictions indicating it will hit the Rs 25 crore milestone by the end of this week.

  • The film garnered Rs 2.15 crore (India net) on its 35th day.
  • It has a fifth-week total of approximately Rs 23.25 crore.
  • Total net collection stands at Rs 1213 crore, surpassing Baahubali 2.
  • The release of the extended version of the film has been delayed to January 17 due to technical issues.
"The extended version will be worth the wait with additional whistle-worthy moments."

This film has established itself as a global blockbuster and is a monumental achievement in the Indian film industry.
